title: Understanding C5 Nerve Root Injuries
description: Comprehensive review of C5 nerve root injuries, typical symptoms, diagnostics, and recovery pathways.

title: Neurostimulation and Functional Recovery
description: Explores the use of neuromuscular electrical stimulation in spinal cord injury recovery.

title: Upper Limb Passive Range of Motion Techniques
description: Demonstration of PROM techniques for patients with limited mobility.
